licence_overview:
To sell a range of chemicals including caustic soda, chemical toilet fluids, drain cleaners and some pesticides and weed killers, you need to be registered with your local authority. 

The chemicals are listed in [Part II of the Poisons Act](http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1972/66 "Poison's Act 1972"){:rel="external"} and are referred to as non-medicinal poisons.
licence_short_description: Licence to sell non-medical poisons in the UK (eg caustic soda, chemical toilet fluids, drain cleaners).
overview: You need a licence to sell non-medical poisons in the UK
title: Registration to sell non-medicinal poisons
